text: Ñɨn nab anɨb sɨŋak Jisas bɨne okok kɨlop mɨseŋ agɨl agak, Yad Jelusalem amen, Juda bɨawl okok sek, bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl okok sek, bɨ kɨli Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨgtep gep okok sek, kɨli yɨp yul ñɨl paklɨnɨgabal agak. Yɨp yul ñɨl paklɨnɨgabal ak pen, ñɨn omɨŋal nokom mɨdɨl tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgayn agak.
